creditline: Gift of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury
description: Lacquered shagreen inrō, decorated on one side with two large gold-stemmed lotus flowers, containing a small inner lacquered box decorated with narrow lines of gold enamel.  The inner box opens in two halves to reveal a small figure of standing Buddha carved from pale-colored wood and decorated with gold on crown, robe and stand.  The shagreen case, of which the two halves are strung together on a small cord that permits cover to be slipped on an off bottom section, wrapped in a scarf on cream silk printed with writhing dragons.
dimension:
5 1/4 x 3 1/4 in. (13.3 x 8.3 cm) (outer case)
4 in. (10.16 cm) (inner case)
title: Inrō containing Buddhist votive figure
